Subject: Re: [neat] HyperNEAT C++ Crossover

Can I request that the next distribution of HyperNEAT C++ come with
all of the required libraries in the appropriate relative paths so
cmake works out of the box? I tried building it a few months back and
had a lot of problems getting the right version of boost and the other
libraries, setting up the paths, etc. and never could get it to fully
compile in the end.

On Wed, Nov 12, 2008 at 6:25 PM, Kenneth Stanley <kstanley@...> wrote:
> Jason and I have been checking the debugged crossover operator by
> rerunning experiments and it appears that (as expected) in aggregate
> results are not altered in any significant way. Jason plans to
> release a revised version of HyperNEAT C++ with the fix in the next
> few days after some more careful checking to make sure it's working as
> it should.
>
> Jeff, thanks very much for bringing the crossover bug to our
> attention. The good news is it should not significantly affect major
> conclusions from prior experimental results.
>
> ken
>
>
